TopicTitle: Need a plugin made I will give who ever accepts 100% of the Credit(i'm bad at coding)

Articles.Content: 100% Credit that's a great deal, but anyway's i need somebody willing to take the challenge of making the biggest mod ever made that adds (when complete) up words of 600+ parts that are big and heavy and the plugin will add TRUE multiplayer not the ****y one that i found that's not even real multiplayer all's that multiplayer is screen sharing, + the plugin will feature a KOS system (still looking for the maker) and you can exit the profile and the Mapping Satilite you just launched will still be doing the job you intend it to do + you'll be able to map a planet and track kethane with one dish (the dish's are varius size's nano-X.X.X.X.L.) and more! right? the mod is Faster Voltage. 42 updates. if you want to do it post your Reply and expect a privite message and a friend request.
Thread closed. If you want someone to make you a mod please do look into the possibilities of what you're asking. If a multiplayer mod was easy it would've been done already.
